name: Naught 'n' crosses
description:
Naught and Crosses game inside VIM against the (dumb) computer.
If you like games, see also the Tetris vimscript#172 and the Sokoban vimscript#211
install_details:
Drop it into your plugin dir, and press
<Leader>xo (if you don't know, what is leader, press \xo)
Press cursor keys or hjkl to move around, Space to put your sign!
